sentences.en: A united effort is always more effective than an isolated complaint.
sentences.cn: 联合行动总是比单个人抱怨更有效。

sentences.en: Amy had the growing sense that she was adrift and isolated.
sentences.cn: 埃米愈发感到自己孤立无援，孑然一身。

sentences.en: Aubrey's family's farm is very isolated.
sentences.cn: 奥布里家的农场非常偏僻。

sentences.en: His bad behaviour was just an isolated incident.
sentences.cn: 他的不良行为只是个别事件。

sentences.en: I felt very isolated in my new job.
sentences.cn: 我在新的工作岗位上觉得很孤独。

sentences.en: I had often been very fearful, very angry, and very isolated.
sentences.cn: 我以前经常感到非常恐惧，非常愤怒，非常孤独。

sentences.en: It's an isolated spot all right.
sentences.cn: 它确实是个偏僻的地方。

sentences.en: Many of the refugee villages are in isolated areas.
sentences.cn: 很多难民村落都在偏远地区。

sentences.en: Men can feel isolated at work.
sentences.cn: 人们工作时可能感到孤立无助。

sentences.en: Not many people visit this isolated spot.
sentences.cn: 没有多少人到这个偏僻的地方来。

sentences.en: Patients with the disease should be isolated.
sentences.cn: 这种病的患者应予以隔离。

sentences.en: Researchers have isolated a new protein from the seeds of poppies.
sentences.cn: 研究人员已经从罂粟种子里分离出一种新的蛋白质。

sentences.en: Several villages in the north have been isolated by heavy snowfalls.
sentences.cn: 北方的几个村庄已被大雪封锁了.

sentences.en: Some patients may become very isolated and depressed.
sentences.cn: 一些病人可能变得非常孤独沮丧。

sentences.en: They have isolated the bacterium in its pure form.
sentences.cn: 他们已经把细菌分离出来,使它们处于较纯的状态.

sentences.en: They said the allegations related to an isolated case of cheating.
sentences.cn: 他们说这些指控与另一件欺诈案有关。

words.tran_cn: 孤立主义的；孤立主义者的
隔离；孤立；[电] 绝缘；[化学] 离析
孤立的；分离的；单独的；[电]绝缘的
使孤立；[电]使绝缘；脱离（isolate的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 隔离的，孤独的，单独的，偏远的
trans.tran_en: an isolated building, village etc is far away from any others

trans.tran_cn: 使隔离(isolate的过去式和过去分词)，使孤立，使绝缘，脱离
